title: (x) 70s soap opera Mary Hartman opening credits - Bookman Swash {Patricia}
content:
Goofy display type from the insane 70s soap opera Mary Hartman Mary Hartman. Which was [just released on DVD](http://web.archive.org/web/20071106163323/http:/www.amazon.com/Mary-Hartman-1/dp/B000MEYKA0).

Thanks!

[http://i22.tinypic.com/xlf50o.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20071106163323/http:/i22.tinypic.com/xlf50o.jpg "http://i22.tinypic.com/xlf50o.jpg")

 [‹ (x) Bauhaus-style geometric sans - Horatio {Lex}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071106163323/http:/typophile.com/node/38040 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) New York magazine geometric constructed display type - custom type by Omnivore {Ricardo Cordoba} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071106163323/http:/typophile.com/node/38027 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Matt Cassity

comments.content:
Ah, yes! That was driving me crazy.  
Thanks!
